attributes.action: empower a counsel to over look all "Hague Convention" and "Brussels II revised" cases in the U.K, where applicable to over-turn Judgement in cases which have  a high welfare risk.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Myself and many other mothers find themselves caught up in the rules of the Hague Convention(international child abduction)after fleeing violent relationships only to be forced back to that country by our own legal system. The welfare of the child is only taken into consideration after the child is returned to the danger.
